Verify the event duration '1 hour' is clearly visible
Verify the event details popup animation lasts 300ms
Open 'https://checkout.com/cart'
Verify the cart title 'Your Shopping Cart' has font size 30px, font family 'Helvetica', and text align 'left'
Verify exactly 2 items are in the cart
Verify the first item 'Laptop Pro' displays quantity '1' and price '1200.00 USD'
Verify the first item's image 'laptop.jpg' has rendered width 80px and is loaded
Verify the 'Remove' button is visible, background #DC3545, and font size 14px
Verify the subtotal '1200.00 USD' is visible with font weight 700
Verify the 'Checkout' button is enabled, background #007BFF, padding 15px 30px, and border radius 4px
Verify the cart container has max width 900px and padding 20px
Verify the shopping cart has min height 300px
Verify the item list has row gap 20px
Verify page scroll-top is 0
Open 'https://admin.panel.com/users'
Verify the 'User Management' heading has font size 26px, color #34495E, and letter spacing 0.5px
Verify the user table contains exactly 5 rows
Verify the 'Add User' button is visible, has background color #17A2B8, and padding 8px 16px
Verify the table header 'Username' has font weight 600
Verify the search filter input has placeholder 'Filter users...' and width 200px
Verify the 'Edit' button for the first user is enabled and has aria-label 'Edit User Profile'
Verify the table has border 1px solid #E9ECEF and uses display 'table'
Verify the pagination component is visible with 2 pages
Verify the 'Delete User' button uses text color rgb(220, 53, 69)
Verify the table container has overflow x 'auto'
Verify the panel has box sizing 'border-box' and min width 1024px
